modelCorrections.beforeModification: <input id="react-autowhatever-site-search-inputinput" aria-haspopup="listbox" aria-expanded="false" type="text" autocomplete="off" aria-autocomplete="list" aria-controls="react-autowhatever-site-search" class="form-control input input--isLarge" placeholder="Search wine and events" aria-describedby="search-instructions" value="">
modelCorrections.afterModification: <input id="react-autowhatever-site-search-inputinput" aria-haspopup="listbox" type="text" autocomplete="off" aria-autocomplete="list" aria-controls="react-autowhatever-site-search" class="form-control input input--isLarge" placeholder="Search wine and events" aria-describedby="search-instructions" value="">
modelCorrections.rawOutput:
- Thought: The input element has an ARIA attribute aria-expanded="false" which is not allowed on an input element according to the WCAG 2.1 guidelines. The aria-expanded attribute is typically used on elements that can expand or collapse, such as buttons or accordions. In this case, since the input element is not an expandable element, we should remove the aria-expanded attribute.

- Corrected HTML:
<input id="react-autowhatever-site-search-inputinput" aria-haspopup="listbox" type="text" autocomplete="off" aria-autocomplete="list" aria-controls="react-autowhatever-site-search" class="form-control input input--isLarge" placeholder="Search wine and events" aria-describedby="search-instructions" value="">
